text: Eugene Gerson "Gene" Glazer is a retired foil fencer from USA. Glazer competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 November 1939.Gene Glazer == References == Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American foil fencers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Eugene Glazer
